message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob.  I could come down to $9,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, Alice. However, I am still unable to go above $8,000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,000?
